channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2025 CFP Odds: If Indiana Wins, Bettor Turns $15, 4-Leg Parlay Into $5,500
item.description: A quick $15 bet could result in some extra pizza money for one of Indiana's faithful fans. Patrick Everson reports.

item.title: Bills Reportedly Fire Head Coach Sean McDermott Following Loss to Broncos
item.description: The Bills are making a major change following their latest playoff disappointment. They've fired Sean McDermott after nine seasons.

item.title: 2025 NFL AFC, NFC Title Odds: Patriots, Seahawks Favored to Make Big Game
item.description: See which squads are favored to make it to the Super Bowl in San Francisco, now that the conference title games are set.

item.title: Sound Smart: 6 Observations From the NFL Divisional Round
item.description: Breaking down the biggest talking points from the second round of the postseason.

item.title: Broncos Add a QB Following Bo Nix's Injury, Signing Ben DiNucci to Practice Squad
item.description: The Broncos are adding a quarterback following Bo Nix's season-ending injury.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea open to Fernández exit; Madrid, PSG interested
item.description: Chelsea's Enzo Fernández could be available this summer as Real Madrid and PSG monitor his situation. Transfer Talk has the latest.

item.title: Kevin Stefanski to Falcons: Grading the hire and the impact on Penix
item.description: Kevin Stefanski didn't have a great record in Cleveland, but he'll have more talent to work with in Atlanta.

item.title: Bills fire McDermott; Beane promoted to president
item.description: The Bills fired coach Sean McDermott and promoted Brandon Beane to president after Buffalo again failed to reach the Super Bowl despite its regular-se...

item.title: Los Angeles prevails in divisional round win over Chicago
item.description: The Bears had been kings of comeback wins, but the Rams are the ones advancing to the NFC title game.

item.title: The Caleb throw, a controversial call and plenty of mistakes: Barnwell sizes up 11 divisional round plays
item.description: Let's sort out Caleb Williams' wild fourth-quarter TD throw, the Broncos' controversial INT, a big Seattle kickoff return TD, a C.J. Stroud pick-six a...
